body:
**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):
v1.5.0-alpha.1.2189+d8fa4f4d564bab-dirty
docker: 1.12.3

**Environment**:
fedora24
docker-engine-1.12.3-1.fc24.x86_64

**What happened**:
if docker Cgroup Driver=cgroupfs, and set --cgroup-driver=systemd in kubelet, then enable --experimental-cgroups-per-qos=true; The container cgroup some is not correct.

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):
```
[root@dhcp-140-57 kubernetes]# kubectl run -it be-pod --image=busybox --restart=Never /bin/sh
Waiting for pod default/be-pod to be running, status is Pending, pod ready: false
Waiting for pod default/be-pod to be running, status is Pending, pod ready: false
If you don't see a command prompt, try pressing enter.
/ # cat /proc/self/cgroup
11:memory:/system.slice/docker.service/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
10:pids:/system.slice/docker.service/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
9:freezer:/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
8:net_cls,net_prio:/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
7:perf_event:/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
6:cpuset:/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
5:cpu,cpuacct:/system.slice/docker.service/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
4:blkio:/system.slice/docker.service/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
3:devices:/system.slice/docker.service/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
2:hugetlb:/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
1:name=systemd:/system.slice/docker.service/BestEffort.slice/BestEffort-pod0d33f94b_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/0c34bcd7d02f321d0df7aa6ea703285b02abebc9096c5128c14091fc43ea1f3b
/ # 
/ # exit
Waiting for pod default/be-pod to terminate, status is Running
[root@dhcp-140-57 kubernetes]# 
[root@dhcp-140-57 kubernetes]# kubectl run -it bu-pod --image=busybox --requests=cpu=100m --restart=Never /bin/sh
Waiting for pod default/bu-pod to be running, status is Pending, pod ready: false
Waiting for pod default/bu-pod to be running, status is Pending, pod ready: false
If you don't see a command prompt, try pressing enter.
/ # cat /proc/self/cgroup
11:memory:/system.slice/docker.service/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
10:pids:/system.slice/docker.service/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035

8:net_cls,net_prio:/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
7:perf_event:/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
6:cpuset:/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
5:cpu,cpuacct:/system.slice/docker.service/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
4:blkio:/system.slice/docker.service/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
3:devices:/system.slice/docker.service/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
2:hugetlb:/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
1:name=systemd:/system.slice/docker.service/Burstable.slice/Burstable-pod33295789_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/dda54a6711ac97684578eddd19dbe7596c8ed099a5bb9c08ec38930ee6c4c035
/ # 
/ # exit
Waiting for pod default/bu-pod to terminate, status is Running
[root@dhcp-140-57 kubernetes]# kubectl run -it gu-pod --image=busybox --limits=cpu=100m,memory=500Mi --restart=Never /bin/sh
Waiting for pod default/gu-pod to be running, status is Pending, pod ready: false
Waiting for pod default/gu-pod to be running, status is Pending, pod ready: false
If you don't see a command prompt, try pressing enter.
/ # cat /proc/self/cgroup
11:memory:/system.slice/docker.service/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
10:pids:/system.slice/docker.service/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
9:freezer:/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
8:net_cls,net_prio:/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
7:perf_event:/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
6:cpuset:/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
5:cpu,cpuacct:/system.slice/docker.service/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
4:blkio:/system.slice/docker.service/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
3:devices:/system.slice/docker.service/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f
2:hugetlb:/pod481d7fba_ab1a_11e6_9e1a_68f7281d8004.slice/45761a13445038568bd87e48d0942b54f0240bce7fb7065d0b4bf5fa5164fb5f

/ # 

```

**Anything else do we need to know**:
1) docker Cgroup Driver=cgroupfs and  --cgroup-driver=cgroupfs in kubelet works well
2) docker Cgroup Driver=systemd and  --cgroup-driver=systemd in kubelet works well

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: Container cgroup hierarchy not correct if docker cgroup driver conflict with kubelet cgroup-driver
